sentences.sContent: an area patrolled by special police units
sentences.sCn: 由特警部队巡逻的地区

phrases.pCn: 公安巡逻艇；[法]警察巡逻

remMethod.val: “派出”→派出警察巡逻→巡逻， 巡查

trans.tranOther: to go around the different parts of an area or building at regular times to check that there is no trouble or danger

trans.tranCn: 巡逻， 巡查；巡逻兵， 巡逻队
trans.tranOther: when someone goes around different parts of an area at regular times to check that there is no trouble or danger
